---
name: Bug report
about: Report a reproducible defect in StackSats
title: "[bug] "
labels: bug
assignees: ""
---

## Summary

Describe the problem and expected behavior.

## Reproduction

1. Environment (`python --version`, OS, install method).
2. Exact command(s) or API call(s).
3. Minimal strategy or input data needed to reproduce.

## Actual behavior

What happened? Include full error messages and tracebacks.

## Expected behavior

What did you expect instead?

## Verification checklist

- [ ] I ran `ruff check .`
- [ ] I ran `pytest tests/ -v`
- [ ] I checked docs for expected usage (`README.md`, `docs/commands.md`)
- [ ] I am not sharing secrets or private credentials
